title: League of legends won't open
body: My friend clicks to open league and it says the PVP launcher won't open

replies.body: My friend had the same error as Cytik, thanks for the help

> [{quoted}](name=MonkeyCheif,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Va6u1EpF,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-28T18:52:22.671+0000)
>
> My friend clicks to open league and it says the PVP launcher won&#039;t open

I had this issue when I fresh installed, did you try running right clicking and running as admin

I'd like to help out with this, but I need some more information.  Is there a specific error message that your friend is receiving?  Does anything appear on the screen at all after opening League?  Anything will help!  Looking forward to helping out.

Hey Cytik, I'm assuming you are the friend MonkeyChief was referring to!  Thanks for the screenshot, it helps a lot!  This error is commonly due to a setting set by your OS which is blocking the patcher from scanning files.  Go over the steps in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to get this fixed up for good.  Hope that helps!
Actually I do not know MonkeyChief, just had the same issue.
im just going to reinstall the game.
